content: But in the current year -- current financial year, we've seen power demand growth at about 5% to 6%, and the expectation is that that will continue over the course of the next year as India's GDP continues to stay robust between this year and next year. So in terms of Intelligent Energy Solutions also, as I think we may have said earlier, there was a 2.5 gigawatt bid that happened last year, that had to be cancelled for some bidding issues, that is likely to get tendered out again in the next couple of months time.
